Package ru.testtask.models

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
ru.testtask.models.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, Player
public class Entity extends Object
The type Entity, which is described in the condition. Has a minimum attack MIN_ATTACK (conditionally 1) and maximum attack MAX_ATTACK (conditionally 30). Has a minimum defense MIN_DEFENSE (conditionally 1) and maximum defense MAX_DEFENSE (conditionally 30). Has a minimum health MIN_HEALTH (conditionally 0) and maximum health MAX_HEALTH (conditionally N - obtained from the application.properties file). Has a minimum damage MIN_DAMAGE (conditionally M - obtained from the application.properties file) and maximum damage MAX_DAMAGE (conditionally N - obtained from the application.properties file). Has field a attack, health, defense and damage, which must fall within the range of the corresponding constants.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(int attack, int defense, int health, int damage)
      Instantiates a new Entity and thrown IllegalArgumentException if the fields are not within the range of the corresponding constants.
      Parameters:
      attack - the attack must be in the range from MIN_ATTACK to MAX_ATTACK.
      defense - the defense must be in the range from MIN_DEFENSE to MAX_DEFENSE.
      health - the health must be in the range from MIN_HEALTH to MAX_HEALTH.
      damage - the damage must be in the range from MIN_DAMAGE to MAX_DAMAGE.

      See Also:
      • Add

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Is alive boolean. If health bigger than MIN_HEALTH return true, else false.
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • attack

      public int attack(Entity defender)
      Attack Entity. The attack occurs according to the following algorithm: - Calculate the Attack Modifier. It is equal to the difference between the attacker's Attack and the defender's Defense plus 1.
      Parameters:
      defender - the defensive Entity.
      Returns:
      the int - damage to the defending Entity.
      See Also:
      • - Success is determined by rolling N dice with numbers from 1 to 6, where N is the Attack Modifier. At least one die is always rolled. - A hit is considered successful if at least one of the dice rolls a 5 or 6.
      • - If the hit is successful, it takes an arbitrary value from the attacker's Damage and subtracts it from the defender's Health.

    • copy

      public Entity copy()
      Copy the object Entity with same attack, defense, health and damage.
      Returns:
      the Entity
